description: Switzerland, Germany, and Austria begin relaxing restrictions, ahead of a full reopening.
title: Relaxed Swiss borders will reunite families and lovers
title_page: Relaxed Swiss borders will reunite families and lovers - BBC News
maintext: A few people whose workplaces remained open could still travel, but most residents in the border communities, used to spending their days in two or even three countries, found themselves confined to one, and often separated from close family members or partners.
